name: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: The Lost World
name_original: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: The Lost World
description:
Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: The Lost World is an educational adventure-puzzle game developed by DataSun Software. It came out on 30-01-2001. Global Star Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: The Lost World on PC.
